name: api_utility_AccessibilityNode
description: A node in the AccessibilityHierarchy representing a visual element, such as a UI element or an element that is part of your game, that needs to be accessible to the screen reader.

properties.name: allowsDirectInteraction
properties.description: Whether the accessibility node allows direct touch interaction while the screen reader is active.

properties.name: children
properties.description: The node's children in the accessibility hierarchy.

properties.name: frame
properties.description: The bounding rectangle of the accessibility node in screen coordinates.

properties.name: frameGetter
properties.description: Delegate that calculates the frame of the accessibility node, automatically keeping it up-to-date.

properties.name: hint
properties.description: Additional guidance or context for interacting with the accessibility node.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique identifier of the accessibility node.

properties.name: isActive
properties.description: Whether the accessibility node is exposed to screen readers. The default value is true.

properties.name: isFocused
properties.description: Whether the accessibility node is currently focused by the screen reader.

properties.name: label
properties.description: A short description of the accessibility node.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The node's parent in the accessibility hierarchy.

properties.name: role
properties.description: The type of user interface element that the accessibility node represents.

properties.name: state
properties.description: The status of the visual element that the accessibility node represents.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value of the visual element that the accessibility node represents.

properties.name: GetHashCode
properties.description: A hash used for comparisons.

properties.name: ToString
properties.description: Provides a debugging string.

properties.name: decremented
properties.description: Event invoked when the user performs a "decrement" action when focused on the accessibility node.

properties.name: dismissed
properties.description: Event invoked when the user performs a "dismiss" action when focused on the accessibility node.

properties.name: focusChanged
properties.description: Event invoked on the main thread when the accessibility node gains or loses screen reader focus.

properties.name: incremented
properties.description: Event invoked when the user performs an "increment" action when focused on the accessibility node.

properties.name: invoked
properties.description: Event invoked when the user performs an "activate" action when focused on the accessibility node.
